categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Black Box was a Delta-class JV-7 escort shuttle used by the Rebel Alliance.

When the Rebels realized that TIE Defenders built by Nami Crime Lord Ali Tarrak were intercepted by then Admiral Thrawn in his Imperial-class Star Destroyer Grey Wolf, they sent a group of 3 Carrack-class light cruisers to fight him. The ships underestimate his new starfighter, the Missile Boat piloted by Tan Maarek Stele and as it was becoming evident they were losing, the Black Box was launched and attempted to escape the battle. The shuttle was inspected by Maarek Stele and destroyed before it could flee.
